Context.statement: Context: SI-4a[1]: Assignment: objectives = Information Change

MainGoal.control_action: monitors and analyzes events to detect potential attacks, anomalies and unauthorized connections
MainGoal.statement: Goal: SI-4 SI-4 Main: Information system monitors and analyzes events to detect potential attacks, anomalies and unauthorized connections; Impact = high, Provides= [ val(events),val(analysisResult)]; aw = 1

MainGoal.control_action: employs integrity verification tools to detect unauthorized changes to the information
MainGoal.statement: Goal: SI-7 SI-7 Main: Information system employs integrity verification tools to detect unauthorized changes to the information; Impact = high, Provides= [ val(Information),val(action),sat(integrityStatus)]; aw = 1

ReqGoal.functional_requirement: All the events are monitored and anomalies are detected
ReqGoal.statement: Goal: SI-4 Req1: services' Monitoring capability maintains All the events are monitored and anomalies are detected; aw = 1

ModuleGoal.statement: Module: DS SI-4 Goal : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of Drug services' Monitoring capability; aw = 1
Module: AS SI-4 Goal : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of Alarm services' Monitoring capability; aw = 1
Module: MAS SI-4 Goal : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of Medical Analysis services' Monitoring capability; aw = 1

Strategy.statement: Strategy: S3 : Argument over services' confidence on Monitoring capability
